monster.name: Maovor

trait.name: Born to Filth
trait.text: Maovor automatically passes Dexterity (Acrobatic) checks when moving across terrain covered in his bile or rotten fish heads.

trait.name: Murderer's Choice
trait.text: When rolling damage for an attack made with a mining pick or war pick, Maovor deals an additional 1d6 piercing damage.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
trait.text: When reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, Maovor drops to 1 hit point instead (but can't do this again until they finish a long rest).

trait.name: Savage Attacks
trait.text: When they score a critical hit, Maovor can roll one of the weapon's damage dice and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 round.

legendary.name: Legendary Actions
legendary.text: Maovor can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Maovor regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Bellow
legendary.text: Maovor screams at a creature. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma save or be frightened for one round.

legendary.name: Bile Puddle
legendary.text: Maovor regurgitates all over an adjacent 5-foot square. Creatures who are in it or who enter it must make a DC 13 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or fall prone.

monster.description:
Gear: one large chunk of ruby ore in his eye socket (worth 250 gp)
Source: Remley Farr - The Sun Goes Down with a Ruby Smile (Homebrew)

monster.name: Ruby

action.name: Crude Spear
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. range 20/40 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4-1) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description:
Gear: Fur clothes, 3 crude spears, letters from parents
Source: Remley Farr - The Sun Goes Down with a Ruby Smile (Homebrew)
